history.content:
If you really want to get into the design industry, check out Berkeley Innovation! Though there is an application, no previous design experience or portfolio required.

Come get glitchy with Berkeley Innovation as we zoom into this fall's remote semester! We are a human-centered design consultancy at UC Berkeley, uniting students from a wide range of disciplines behind a shared love for design thinking and innovation. Our members gain experience through design projects with professional clients, jumpstart their design careers, and grow together as creatives.

Want to learn more? Come to our infosession TONIGHT (9/1) at 6 pm PDT on Zoom or our application workshops on Wednesday 9/2 and Friday 9/4!

Facebook event: https://www.facebook.com/events/2799253796970206

Website: https://www.berkeleyinnovation.org/
history.subject: Interested in UI/UX/product design? check out Berkeley Innovation!
